# Tab

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Tab content component.
Use this component to specify the content of a component.

## Properties

| Property  | Attribute  | Description                                       | Type     | Default     |
| --------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `header`  | `header`   | The header you want to be displayed for this tab. | `string` | `undefined` |
| `itemKey` | `item-key` | The id of the tab. It should be unique.           | `any`    | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event       | Description                              | Type                |
| ----------- | ---------------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| `tabLoaded` | Do not use, meant for internal use only. | `CustomEvent<void>` |
